title: ðŸš¨ Gurley to the Falcons! Gordon to the Broncos! Who's Better? (03/20 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We react to Todd Gurley and Melvin Gordon going to the Falcons and Broncos, respectively. Who do we like better? How do they compare to David Johnson? How involved will they be near the goal line and in the passing game?Â 
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
